author: CBC News
title: Brace for the COVID-19 surge, warns N.L. health minister, as cases hit 183
description: Newfoundland and Labrador total caseload is now 183.
content:
As Newfoundland and Labrador recorded eight new cases of COVID-19 on Thursday, Health Minister John Haggie said the province is facing challenges in getting protective equipment for front line health-care workers.
"We are engaging provincially, nationally an… [+5546 chars]
